author: mkienenb
msg: Fixing bug where resources can't be found if ;jsession=* is part of the URL (on new session creation).
My understanding of servlet paths and URIs is pretty weak, so I'd appreciate some review by those who know more about it.
However, the problem is fixed in my application, and logging both the old and new values seem to indicate the desired behavior, which is to allow the container to strip off the session information.
MYFACES-854 might also be solved with this fix.   A quick glance at other recent MyFaces issues didn't show any other related bugs, but it's possible that more are out there.
